h1_title: How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses
h2_title: How to Find Yellow Loong - Chapter 4 Secret Boss
content: From here, continue up the stairs to the right and you'll see a figure waiting by the shelter. As you approach, a cutscene will begin and you'll be thrown into the fight against Yellow Loong.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Secret_Loong_Dragon_Bosses.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Yellow Loong - Chapter 4 Secret Boss'.
The content is as follows:
From here, continue up the stairs to the right and you'll see a figure waiting by the shelter. As you approach, a cutscene will begin and you'll be thrown into the fight against Yellow Loong.
